title: Yo anyone else lose their old 2012 championship riven skin and have it replaced with the new one wtf
body: ive been playing league since like 2011 and i got the season 2 championship riven while watching the 2nd season championship and now i have had it replaced with the new re release version, legit one day i had it then the next day it switched, didnt have the border or anything  anyone else have the same thing happen? ive opened a ticket already but havent had a response yet...

replies.body: It looks like you have both versions unlocked on your account!  You should be able to slide through your skins during champion select, and choose Championship Riven.  Not Championship Riven 2016!  :D  Let me know if that clears things up!
